Method Detail

m232

public static final long m232(long a,
                              long b)
Does an addition modulus 2^32 and returns the result. Needed since Java does not have unsigned integers. UPDATE: They act the same. This really is not needed.

Parameters:
a - first integer
b - second integer
Returns:
the new integer

not

public static final int not(int x)
Performs a bitwise not operation. Negates the integer and subtracts one. NOTE: ~ performs the not operation.

Parameters:
x - integer to be flipped
Returns:
the flipped integer

rotateLeft

public static final int rotateLeft(int x,
                                   int s)
Rotates the bits left s positions.

Parameters:
x - Bits to rotate
s - number of positions to shift
Returns:
the rotated bits
